name: Ys V: Lost Kefin, Kingdom of Sand
name_original: Ys V: Lost Kefin, Kingdom of Sand
description: Ys V: Lost Kefin, Kingdom of Sand (イースV 失われた砂の都ケフィン, Īsu Faibu: Ushinawareta Suna no Miyako Kefin,Ys V: Ushinawareta Suna no Miyako Kefin) is an action role-playing video game for the Super Famicom developed by Nihon Falcom.[1] It is the fifth game in the Ys series of video games.
